Budun wahanse kawadawath mandira thanuwe na. A hamadeyakma hadala parithyaga kara misaka. Mokada unwahansege gaman maga eka nemei. comments.comment: I have strong doubts whether this person known as Samatha Bhadra priest 'really' follows Buddhist principles. Does he follow the 'MIDDLE PATH'? Does he follow the 'EIGHT NOBLE TRUTHS' ?  I do not feel so because of the words he tells and because of the extremes he goes to in modern world using methods to cause more sufferings by showing attachments to objects (Physical world) rather than spiritual aspects. If his laymen priests and ordinary people who are villagers follow his objectives, Buddhist principles and culture beginning to decline now will definitely disappear soon. He goes limitless in his unwise vision. No 'BRAKES'. For every action he does there is a reason using Buddhism and technology. He uses statements in Buddhism twisted in order to support his vision. Why he chose a remote area may be to generate a large number of his followers who are 'IGNORANT' about true Buddhist principles. This is a SAD situation. When several NGO's in the world especially in the US spent huge sums of money to dissolve Buddhism, it is not surprising to see NGO's hiring priests and clergy of other religions like Charles (Kandulu programme) to brainwash Buddhists who have no/less knowledge about Buddhist principles to get 'CONVERTED' to be anti-Buddhists with anew Buddhist label fixed by these NGO hired groups. Migara mathu prasadhaya gihiyaku wisin nimawaa budun wahanseta puujaa karapu ekak. Namuth bikshuunwahanse namak tamanta awashya paridi, Ithaamath wehesa mahansi wemin, mudal ganudenu karamin. Thaman udesaa ho sangarathnaya udesaa. Meweni kriyaawak sidukarana lada bawa itihaasaye kisidu pothakin ho apa asa natha.
Namuth budhdha sasanayehi anagathayaudesa bohoowita upakaareewiyahaka.

Rahatan wahanse namak yai kiyagannaa unwahase.
Gruhanirmaana shilpayehi agathanpath bikshuunwahanse. 
Kalamanakarithwayehi agathanpath bikshuunwahanse.
Nagarasalasum karanayehi agathanpath bikshuunwahanse. 
Ginumkaranayehi agathanpath bikshuunwahanse. 
Wayapara karanayehi agathanpath bikshuunwahanse.
Manawasampath kalamanakaranayehi agathanpath bikshuunwahanse.
Wani tanathurak sandahaa wadaath uchitha bawa magehagimai.
Namuth budhdha sasanayehi anagathayaudesa bohoowita upakaareewiyahaka.
